verbs.description: [ARG0: sweet potato orange cups] [V: serve] [ARG2: this refreshingly sweet side dish to your guests in separate cups you craft] … from oranges all you have to do is cut oranges in half scoop out the fruit and fill the peel with the sweet potato mixture it a hit among our family and friends —melonie bowers sugarcreek ohio sweet potato potato
